resources.string: In this app you will find three games in which you will be asked to complete the games before exiting the app or you will lose all progress. We made the app this way to be devoted to the people around the world who enjoy challenges of completing games in one sitting and we hope that we have accomplished this. If there are any issues with the app please contact the main developer at Jordang3177@gmail.com

In this part of the app you will find the Sudoku portion of the app. Sudoku is a 9x9 game in which you have to complete the board, and each row, column, and box cannot have the same number in any of the three. Once you meet all these requirements and the board is filled then you have won the game!

In this part of the app you will find the TicTacToe portion of the app. TicTacToe is a game played on a 3x3 board where you need to get three of your pieces in a row there are traditionally two players, one for the x, and one for the os. Players rotate each turn and the game either ends when one person has three of their tokens in 3 of a row, or when the board is filled which results in a draw.

In this part of the app you will find the Chess portion of the app. Chess is a game in which two players try to defeat the other by taking out their king while protecting their own. You have a multitude of pieces each with their own movement rules. The pawn which can move either 1 space or 2 spaces forward on the first move, and may only take an opposing piece if it is diagonal to it and if it ever reaches the other side of the board then it will become one of the pieces you have lost. The rook which can move in straight lines. The Bishop which can move in diagonal lines. The knight which can move in an L shape. The Queen which can move any direction. The King which can move in any direction but only 1 space at a time.
